Trade/Device Name(s): Medical Wire & Equipment ∑-Transwab (Sigma-Transwab) Liquid Amies Collection and Transport Device
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medical Wire & Equipment S-Transwab/Sigma-Transwab Liquid Amies Collection and Transport Device for microbiological specimen collection and transport
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to preserve the viability and infectivity of microbiological specimens after collection and during transport from the collection site to the testing laboratory; specimens are processed using standard clinical laboratory operating procedures for microbiological specimens
